casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Emanuel RAY. No. 106P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Charles E. Reece, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of July 2007 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007."
